column6: Welcome, JR
Welcome, Daazz

Use this space to discuss the relative merits and demerits of each plan from your assigned perspective in step 3. That was the step where you were asked to write an individual proposal and post it to the discussion forum. Work towards a consensus on which plan you think is the best as a group. Wherever possible, supplement plan suggestions, agreements and disagreements with reasons, and try to refer to or build upon your teammates' ideas. I will support you in the process.

column6: Welcome, david
Hi guys
Hey there
What do you think of Plan 2?
Hey Daazz, can you elaborate on the reason you chose plan 2 from your perspective of what would be the most economical ?
Welcome, mo
Welcome, david
Thank you, Bazaar

While I realize it's a little over budget it's probably the most ethical way to go. Coal isn't renewable so any plan with a higher usage of coal energy is a no-no. Plan 2 utilizes the same amount of percentage for all energy routes except for wind, which is probably the best form of energy
Plus, the tax credit is pretty sweet by using wind power
I agree with you Daazz
I believe that wind energy is the best way to go.
I actually agree from looking at the box of choices. It's a good trade off though it's above $900,000,000
I like that there is no carbon tax.
Yeah that's the only issue.. Hopefully the savings they can get back by using renewable in the long-term will decrease the cost later on
Or waste tax.
zero carbon cost are great for plan 2
plus there are no waste disposal cost for plan 2
I think under the teams proposal we have to write a proposal like at the beginning
but a group proposal
while plan 2 is over budget, it makes the most sense.
do we all agree on plan 2?
I'd say so
